# Emirates NBA Cup quarterfinals: What to know before single-elimination bracket tips off
The Knockout Rounds begin Dec. 9 and 10 with 8 teams looking to advance to the semis and championship in Vegas.
Jon Hartzell, NBA.com

# NBA Cup 2025: Schedule, format, rules, groups, odds and picks for in-season tournament

## Here's a look at the groups, format, odds and teams worth keeping an eye on as the NBA Cup starts Friday

By
[Robby Kalland](https://www.cbssports.com/writers/robby-kalland/)

Oct 31, 2025
at
10:50 am ET•
9 min read

Join the Conversation

comments

Getty Images

The [NBA](https://cbssports.com/nba/) Cup is back. The league's in-season tournament is entering its third season as part of the [NBA schedule](https://cbssports.com/nba/schedule/), and this year's edition will tip-off Friday, as group play begins on

metadata.title: [Short fuse] Who will win the 2025 NBA Cup?
metadata.description:
The [NBA Cup](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NBA_Cup) is an in-season tournament held in during the [NBA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Basketball_Association) regular season. Dating back to 2023, the NBA Cup is a fairly recent innovation designed to attract viewership to the early part of the season.

Formatted like many soccer tournaments, the NBA Cup begins with a group stage that involves all thirty teams in the league, followed by an eight-team knockout stage that, unlike the NBA playoffs, consists of harder-to-predict single-elimination games. In 2023, in its inaugural year, the Cup was won by LeBron James and the Los Angeles Lakers. In 2024, the Cup went to the Milwaukee Bucks, who beat out the Oklahoma City Thunder, who would ultimately go on to win the NBA Finals at the end of the season.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":40779,"question_id":40438}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the team that wins the 2025 NBA Cup.
metadata.fine_print: If the 2025 NBA Cup is delayed beyond January 11, 2026 or the winner is otherwise not known before January 11, 2026, this question will be **annulled**.
